DOC.brief_summary: Phase II trial study effectiveness combination chemotherapy peripheral stem cell transplantation treat patient undergone surgery stage III ovarian cancer . Drugs use chemotherapy use different way stop tumor cell divide stop grow die . Combining chemotherapy peripheral stem cell transplantation may allow doctor give high dos chemotherapy drug kill tumor cell .
DOC.brief_title: Combination Chemotherapy Peripheral Stem Cell Transplantation Treating Patients With Stage III Ovarian Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine safety feasibility multiple course high dose carboplatin , paclitaxel , topotecan initial chemotherapy combine autologous peripheral blood stem cell transplantation patient optimally debulked stage III ovarian primary peritoneal carcinoma . II . Determine pathological complete response rate , disease free survival , overall survival patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Mobilization harvest : Within 8 week surgical debulking , patient receive cyclophosphamide IV 1 hour , follow 4 hour later paclitaxel IV 24 hour . Patients receive filgrastim ( G-CSF ) subcutaneously ( SQ ) daily begin 24 hour completion paclitaxel infusion continue blood count recover autologous peripheral blood stem cell ( PBSC ) harvest select CD34+ cell . High dose chemotherapy transplantation ( 3 week PBSC harvest ) : Patients receive paclitaxel IV 24 hour begin day 1 , immediately follow carboplatin IV 2 hour , immediately follow topotecan IV 24 hour . Patients receive G-CSF sub-cutaneously ( SQ ) daily begin 24 hour completion topotecan infusion continue blood count recover 2 day . One quarter PBSC reinfused begin 2 day completion topotecan infusion . Treatment repeat every 4 week 4 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients radiographic biochemical complete response undergo laparoscopy second look surgery within 8 week last course chemotherapy . If evidence disease find laparoscopy , exploratory laparotomy must also perform . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year , every 6 month 3 year , annually thereafter time recurrence death .
DOC.criteria: Histologically prove optimally debulked stage III ovarian primary peritoneal carcinoma Any follow subtypes : Serous adenocarcinoma Mucinous adenocarcinoma Clear cell carcinoma Transitional cell carcinoma Endometrioid adenocarcinoma Undifferentiated adenocarcinoma Mixed epithelial adenocarcinoma Adenocarcinoma , otherwise specify No ovarian carcinoma low malignant potential ( borderline ) Concurrent superficial endometrial cervical carcinoma allow ovarian carcinoma life threaten limit Must undergone appropriate primary surgical stag debulking ovarian carcinoma le 1 cm residual disease No 8 week since prior surgical debulking Must Hickman catheter place eligible placement No CNS involvement Performance status GOG 0 1 Absolute neutrophil count least 1,500/mm^3 Platelet count least 100,000/mm^3 Bilirubin great 1.5 mg/dL SGOT SGPT great 2 time upper limit normal No active hepatitis Creatinine great 1.5 mg/dL Creatinine clearance least 60 mL/min No renal failure Curatively treat ureteral obstruction allow creatinine measurement meet No congestive heart failure No myocardial infarction within past 6 month No significant arrhythmia require medication No poorly control systolic diastolic hypertension ( diastolic blood pressure consistently great 100 mm Hg ) No significant nonneoplastic pulmonary disease No malignancy within past 5 year except basal cell squamous cell skin cancer carcinoma situ cervix HIV negative No severe medical psychiatric illness include , limited following : Acute infection Active peptic ulcer disease Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus Prior hospitalization psychiatric illness , include severe depression psychosis Concurrent alcohol drug abuse No prior chemotherapy malignancy No radiotherapy great 25 % bone marrow See Disease Characteristics
